node.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <java version="1.7.0_21" class="java.beans.XMLDecoder"> <object class="ckEditor.treegui.CKSingleParent"> <void method="add"> <object class="ckGameEngine.actions.CKSequentialAction"> <void method="add"> <object class="ckGameEngine.actions.CKSimpleGUIAction"> <void property="mess"> <string>Yo, it's time to learn to walk!</string> </void> <void property="pc"> <string>mom</string> </void> </object> </void> <void method="add"> <object class="ckGameEngine.actions.CKSimpleGUIAction"> <void property="mess"> <string>To walk, you have to use the move() function, giving it a direction and a distance. Like move('forward',1)</string> </void> <void property="pc"> <string>mom</string> </void> </object> </void> <void method="add"> <object class="ckGameEngine.actions.CKSimpleGUIAction"> <void property="mess"> <string>Functions are case sensitive, Move() will not work.</string> </void> <void property="pc"> <string>mom</string> </void> </object> </void> <void method="add"> <object class="ckGameEngine.actions.CKSimpleGUIAction"/> </void> </object> </void> </object> </java>
